Topic.Title: The idea of spending your way to success as opposed to creating wealth to prosperity

Message.Msg: It probably started with social security, which led to Medicare - the biggest entitlement programs and growing. It started the dependency on government to provide for us and take care of us from cradle to grave. All those Keynesian policies were discredited, but we're going back to them now. Americans are going for security at the price of opportunity.
